--- title: Fast Trees keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Cute little python module that sits atop the tree-sitter library to provide an easier to use and cleaner interface for interacting with source code" description: "Cute little python module that sits atop the tree-sitter library to provide an easier to use and cleaner interface for interacting with source code" nb_path: "nbs/index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install fast-trees

How to use

Easily work with source code data by using the high level API. Here's how you can grab the parameters of a java method:

{% raw %} 
mthd = """public static void main(String[] args, Object clazz) {
    // This is a test
    System.out.println(args[0]);
    /**
        This is another test!
    */
}
"""
parser = FastParser("java")
print(parser.get_method_parameters(mthd))

Repo already exists, continuing.
['args', 'clazz']
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
inline_comments = parser.get_method_inline_comments(mthd)
for c in inline_comments:
    print(c)

// This is a test
/**
        This is another test!
    */
{% endraw %}
